full_output.summary: Proficient in C++ with strong problem-solving skills in Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA).

projects.name: Product Price Comparision Website
projects.description: Collaborated with a team of 4 to create an e-commerce product price comparison website as part of an academic project, employing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP. Constructed a comprehensive platform with essential web development functionalities, including secure user registration, encrypted login, a feedback system, and an intuitive search interface. Integrated the Real-Time Amazon Data API to dynamically retrieve and showcase product details such as title, price, rating, and reviews, improving real-time data access.

experiences.description: Developed responsive front-end solutions using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enhancing user experience and engagement. Developed a single platform for multiple activities, improving user convenience and productivity. Led a team of 4 in designing and developing a webpage with 6 integrated web applications, including Sci-Calculator, File-Uploader, News, Music, Stop-Watch, and Unit-Converter, improving overall UI.

Gained in-depth knowledge of Software Development Life Cycle(SDLC), Software Testing Life Cycle(STLC), software testing types, and various testing techniques. Developed automated test scripts using Katalon Studios, reducing manual testing time by 40% for the Cura Healthcare Service platform. Executed test automation for key modules, improving overall testing efficiency and accuracy.

full_output.name: Snehalatha Golla
